text: Jordi Miralles i Conte (27 April 1962 â€“ 14 October 2015) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Barcelona. He represented the district in the Parliament of Catalonia from 2003 to 2012. He was a member of the United and Alternative Left. Miralles died in Bellvitge, Spain of meningitis, aged 53. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from meningitis Category:Infectious disease deaths in Spain Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Jordi Miralles
